title: Spicy Vegetable and Paneer Tart
ingredients: ['110g paneer', '2 teaspoons harissa paste', '1 red onion, chopped', '1 red pepper, chopped', '1 green chilli, sliced finely', '1 courgette, chopped', '3 tomatoes, chopped', '1 teaspoon whole cumin seeds', '1 teaspoon chopped fresh coriander', '1 clove garlic', 'glug of olive oil', '3 eggs', '100ml double cream', '1 teaspoon garam masala', 'a few basil leaves', '1 pinch chilli powder', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 (20cm) shortcrust pastry case']
